forum.content:
Went to Taipei the past weekend to hangout wit my friends who is visiting from the states. We went to jufen, Rauhe night market, and elektro night club 🙌🏼 The DJ at elektro really sucked... but I got to hang out with my friends so it's cool 💁🏻‍♂️ Tried drawing this photo I took at Jufen of my friends, but lost the flow so it's half way done now 😂

I think a lot of you are trying find a group or individual to practice English, but really you can just start writing journals in English here, and put a quick side note saying you wish to be corrected if there are errors. I'm sure there are people who would like to help out, at least I'm one 😉

Peace
forum.title: #MAY2k15TaipeiTrip
